summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2656 for the improvement of North Seventy-ninth Street, from Fremont Avenue to Eighth Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks, under Ordinance No. 31238, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
